sentences.sContent: For any place, but in particular for any city to live, you must have faith in it, in its reality and significance.
sentences.sContent_eng: For any place, but in particular for any city to live, you must have faith in it, in its reality and significance.
sentences.sCn: 对于任何地方，特别是对于一个居住城市而言，你必须对它有信心、对它的现实和意义有信心。

sentences.sContent: The goals and scope, in particular, show you the direction to move.
sentences.sContent_eng: The goals and scope, in particular, show you the direction to move.
sentences.sCn: 特别是目标和范围能告诉您下一步工作的方向。
